name: Nitro Driver DX
description:
Get ready to push the pedal to the metal in Nitro Driver DX; a fast-paced driving game for speedsters! Swipe left and right to swerve the busy streets of Future City and collect cash. Use your riches to fill your garage with cooler and better rides; the more cars you own, the more cash you'll make. Upgrade your vehicles to increase their health and efficiency, then drift your way to the top of the leaderboard!

FEATURES:

- Easy one swipe controls
- Unlock 35 unique vehicles
- Upgrade your cars to survive longer on the road
- Collect Daily Rewards for more cash
- Reach the top of the leaderboard and become the ultimate Nitro Driver!

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/bootjetgames/
